question_content.barrons:question: In which of the following pairs of years were the ratios of Republican receipts to Democratic receipts most nearly equal?
question_content.barrons:explanation:
1987–88 and 1989–90

For each of the pairs of years in question, use the graph to approximate the ratio of Republican to Democratic receipts. For example, in 1981–82, Republican receipts were slightly over $200 million and Democratic receipts were about $40 million, a ratio of 5:1. The only two pairs of years in which the ratio was very close were 1987–88 and 1989–90; in both of those pairs of years the ratio was very nearly 2:1.
